name: Amazon Style
description: Made by Stylish, remade into amazon.com.au
css: @-moz-document domain("amazon.com") {      .feed-carousel-card .product-image   {     width: 80% !important;   }    #landingImage   {     width: 80% !important;   }    .a-dynamic-image.a-stretch-vertical   {     height: auto !important;   }    .feed-carousel-card   {     padding: 5px !important;     border-right: 1px solid #f5f5f5 !important;     margin: 10px !important;   }    .a-carousel-card   {     padding: 15px !important;   }    #nav-upnav, .rhf-frame, #rhf-border   {     display: none !important;   }    body   {     background: url(https://s20.postimg.cc/xsu2o47fh/relax-nature.jpg) !important;     background-size: 100% !important;     background-attachment: fixed !important;   }    .navSwmHoliday   {     background: none !important;   }    #nav-belt, #nav-main, #navbar   {     background: none !important;     /* background:rgba(255,255,255,0.5) !important; */;   }    #navbar   {     background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;   }    .a-carousel-center   {     display: none !important;   }    .bestsellers, .desktop-row, .sidekick   {     width: 100%;     background: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important;   }    .a-fixed-right-grid-inner, .shogun-widget   {     background: none !important;   }    #main-content-top   {     background: transparent !important;   }    #rhf-container   {     background: transparent !important;   }    #navFooter.navLeftFooter   {     background-color: rgba(35,47,62,0.8) !important;   }    #navFooter.navLeftFooter .navFooterDescLine   {     background-color: rgba(35,47,62,0) !important;   }    #rhf .rhf-fresh-header   {     color: #fff !important;   }    #searchTemplate, #rightContainerATF, #divsinglecolumnminwidth   {     background: rgba(255,255,255,0.8) !important;   }    #pageContent   {     background: rgba(255,255,255,0.5) !important;   }    #a-page   {     background: rgba(255,255,255,0.5) !important;   }    #dp   {     background: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important;   } }
